review: It is really great .I play it almost every day. thank you fire tv stick.
author: james paul anvia

review: We love our Amazon Fire TV Stick!  We're hooked on Netflix and Amazon Prime tv/movies and the Fire Stick makes everything easy to access from any tv in the house.  Fairly simple to install and we had it setup in about 10 minutes.  What a great little device!  I can't believe we were living without it!
author: TG Amazon Fan

review: SO far so good!  I love it
author: Kim
